::Orchestra/Composer/Symphony::

       "Ready as I'll ever be!" He assured Blacknightmare.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     Composer nodded.

      "Ah, good work on shields underwater.  Yes, if we can get turrets up,
I can give you a 88% garantee that it will blast out anyone who tries to
attack from above," He said.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
       Symphony puts away his gun, and drops down to the ground.  A chunk of
metal flies past his head.  Vehement's attack makes him burn a little.  Man,
these guys were ridiculous!

        "Now to finish you off!!!!!" Symphony got up and yelled, he looked
in his arm compartment,"I knew these would come in handy!"

         Symphony had 5 grenades stored in there, he recieved them as a gift
from his older brother Composer.

          "TAKE THIS!" He yelled.

           He pulled the pin on each grenade, and threw all 5 of them out
towards the Brotherhood, he gave them a scattered throw though.
